Class CustomLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • CustomLine

  • public class CustomLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class repreents the custom line drawn by the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomLine() 
      CustomLine(int oldX, int oldY, int currX, int currY, int basicStrokeSize, java.awt.Color color)
      Instantiates the custom line with the corresponding coordinates and attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomLine

        public CustomLine()

      • CustomLine

        public CustomLine(int oldX,
                  int oldY,
                  int currX,
                  int currY,
                  int basicStrokeSize,
                  java.awt.Color color)
        Instantiates the custom line with the corresponding coordinates and attributes.
        Parameters:
        oldX - the X coordinate when the mouse is pressed or the last current X coordinate.
        oldY - the Y coordinate when the mouse is pressed or the last current Y coordinate.
        currX - the X coordinate produced when the mouse is dragged.
        currY - the Y coordinate produced when the mouse is dragged.
        basicStrokeSize - the thickness of the line.
        color - the color of the line.
